pages.text: $(li)The Bayou is a biome composed of mostly of vegetation and trees flooded by abundant water that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can see vegetation like Cypress trees, Algaes, different kinds of lillypads, Tall Cattails, Tall Purple Pickerelweed and Beard Moss.

$(li)You can find animals like $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/shoebill)Shoebills$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l), or a lot of different kind of fishes in this place.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Bayou$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
